title: British complicity in murder of Burma’s national hero Aung San raises issues for wider investigation of British crimes in colonial era
content: – by Shenali Waduge – Mr. David Cameron, British Prime Minister, has vowed to give Sri Lanka lessons on human rights when he attends the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting in Sri Lanka in November 2013. It is an astonishing statement coming from a head of a country that once ran an Empire not…
